scripts.dev: pnpm --filter shadcn dev & pnpm --filter nextjs exec next dev -p 3101
scripts.watch:site: pnpm run build && pnpm run sync:site && trap 'kill 0' EXIT; chokidar 'index.html' 'packages/nextjs/out/**' 'packages/shadcn/storybook-static/**' 'packages/vue2/dist/**' 'packages/react/dist/**' -c 'pnpm run sync:site' & pnpm --filter shadcn build-storybook & pnpm --filter nextjs build & pnpm --filter vue2 build & pnpm --filter react build & python3 -m http.server 8080 -d _site
scripts.sync:site: mkdir -p _site/multi-fw-demo && cp index.html _site/multi-fw-demo/ && ([ -d packages/nextjs/out ] && mkdir -p _site/multi-fw-demo/nextjs && cp -r packages/nextjs/out/. _site/multi-fw-demo/nextjs/ || true) && ([ -d packages/shadcn/storybook-static ] && mkdir -p _site/multi-fw-demo/shadcn && cp -r packages/shadcn/storybook-static/. _site/multi-fw-demo/shadcn/ || true) && ([ -d packages/vue2/dist ] && mkdir -p _site/multi-fw-demo/vue2 && cp -r packages/vue2/dist/. _site/multi-fw-demo/vue2/ || true) && ([ -d packages/react/dist ] && mkdir -p _site/multi-fw-demo/react && cp -r packages/react/dist/. _site/multi-fw-demo/react/ || true)
